import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Card } from 'semantic-ui-react' import {NavLink,BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Switch} from 'react-router-dom' import TenderStatus from '../components/TenderStatus' export default function TenderLogs(props) { const[dvalue,setdValue]=useState('') const[refresh,setRefresh]=useState(false) refreshpage=()=>{ setRefresh(true) } const clickHandler = async ()=>{ await props.contract.methods.donate().send( {from : props.account,value:props.web3.utils.toWei(dvalue,'ether')}) } console.log('inside tednrlg') return (
